argumentText:
ARGUMENT
x

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | #P_df-nn | |- NN = ( rec ( ( x e. _V |-> ( x + 1 ) ) , 1 ) " _om ) |
| 2 |  | #P_rdgfun | |- Fun rec ( ( x e. _V |-> ( x + 1 ) ) , 1 ) |
| 3 |  | #P_omex | |- _om e. _V |
| 4 |  | #P_funimaexg | |- ( ( Fun rec ( ( x e. _V |-> ( x + 1 ) ) , 1 ) /\ _om e. _V ) -> ( rec ( ( x e. _V |-> ( x + 1 ) ) , 1 ) " _om ) e. _V ) |
| 5 | 2, 3, 4 | #P_mp2an | |- ( rec ( ( x e. _V |-> ( x + 1 ) ) , 1 ) " _om ) e. _V |
| 6 | 1, 5 | #P_eqeltri | |- NN e. _V |
\
 Alternate proof of ~ nnex , more direct.  (Contributed by NM, 3-Oct-1999.)  (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 3-May-2014.) (Proof modification is discouraged.)  (New usage is discouraged.)
